Class Message

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.utils.messages.Message
public class Message extends Object
Represents a dialog message with customizable caption, message text, and button labels.

This class is used to display confirmation or informational dialogs to the user, such as delete confirmations or unsaved changes warnings.

    • UNSAVED_CHANGES

      public static final Message.MessageSupplier UNSAVED_CHANGES
      Predefined message supplier for unsaved changes warning dialogs. The message supports one formatting parameter (e.g., entity name).

      public static final Message.MessageSupplier CONFIRM_DELETE

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(String caption, String okText, String cancelText, String message)
      Constructs a new Message with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      caption - the dialog title or caption
      okText - the text for the confirmation button
      cancelText - the text for the cancel button
      message - the message body to display in the dialog
